title: FALSE: Martial Law was the golden age of the Philippine economy
summary: Martial Law was marked by economic decline, human rights violations, and widespread corruption.

title: FALSE: Vaccines are part of a population control plan
summary: There is no scientific basis for this claim. Vaccines are safe and save lives.

title: FALSE: The 2024 national budget allocates nothing to education
summary: The Department of Education received one of the largest allocations in the 2024 budget.

title: FALSE: Troll farms are a myth
summary: Investigations and reports confirm that coordinated disinformation networks exist.

title: FALSE: All activists are communists
summary: Labelling all dissent as communist is a form of red-tagging and has led to human rights abuses.
